website_summaries.verdict: Generally, Teva’s Katavi 2 Sandal is positively received by outdoorsmen. Its satisfying versatility and admirable style are just a couple of reasons why it was appreciated. Add to that is its value for money and durability. Its sizing was a bit off though. Overall, if future owners do not mind sizing up, the Katavi 2 Sandal’s list of benefits may give them enjoyment whether it’s on or off the trails.
pros: The Teva Katavi 2 Sandal earned praises from the majority for its versatility
One even declared that it worked well in a lot of outdoor activities
Straight out of the box, it was very comfortable, based on a handful of customer reviews
A few of those who have used the Katavi 2 Sandals for quite some time testified to its durability
It was worth the purchase, as exclaimed by a number of online buyers
Several owners mentioned that they received compliments for its stylish look
The Keen men’s Katavi 2 Sandals from was better than the older version, according to a couple of brand loyalists
Some recreational hikers commented that they wore it every day and had no complaints ever since
cons: A portion of verified purchasers said that it runs small

customer_reviews.title: Form over function
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking shoe, nice outer sole and looks well made. The good stuff ends there. The innersole was simply a hard rubber like material - I expected some padding like memory foam or gel. I'm sure the soles of my feet would sweat after a short time. The insides of the straps were not padded sufficiently and I envisioned red and chaffed skin from rubbing against the straps. Teva did a nice job on the outside of the shoe but the inside needs more work to be made comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Broke sooner than they should under light use
customer_reviews.text: Edited: From 5 star to 2. I got less than 4 months of very light use out of these before the toe strap pulled free of the soles. They barely show wear anywhere else. Kiva support has been no help. Even a quality brand can have product issues occasionally, but the real test is how well they stand behind their products. I am disappointed and will be trying another brand for my next pair. It takes a little breaking in before the straps stop chafing, but once broken in these are very comfortable. This is my fourth pair and I tend to get a year or two out of them before I have worn them out.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Fit the very first time.
customer_reviews.text: I've had a pair like these that finally wore out after many years. I was a little skeptical buying this pair without trying them on. However, when they arrived and I took them out of the box, they not only looked like my first pair, but they fit like a glove. I think I made a great purchase at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: stoney

customer_reviews.title: Not an improvement from previous models
customer_reviews.text: Teva provides a quality product. This M Katavi 2 was adequate, but I missed the elegance of previous models. While this sandal will serve as a quality product for many, its looks are adequate but not something I would wear off the trail.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Rogers

customer_reviews.title: a little small
customer_reviews.text: the katavi 2 is a little smaller than the original katavi and the materials are more stiff than the original, but still a very good sandle
customer_reviews.author: Martha W.

customer_reviews.title: Great sandal
customer_reviews.text: Great comfort & support. No blisters or sore spots after long wear. Nice, simple style. I wear a size 13; true to size. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: J.J.M.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing. Once again the color of the image is ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing. Once again the color of the image is nothing like what I received. Anyone that is familiar with a walnut knows it is a light brown or tan colored nut. What I received is very more light grey. Shame on whomever does the photography. This seems to be a reoccurring issue with Amazon. The moral of the story is either see the item at a brick and mortar store or just trust what you see is what you will not receive.
customer_reviews.author: Need to know

customer_reviews.title: I suppose they will eventually wear the rough spot smooth but for the time being it is annoying. Other than for that I would give them ...
customer_reviews.text: My problem is that I have to wear a band aid on the ball of my left foot to prevent blisters. I suppose they will eventually wear the rough spot smooth but for the time being it is annoying. Other than for that I would give them a four or five star rating.
customer_reviews.author: Third Wiley

customer_reviews.title: Third pair
customer_reviews.text: Extremely comfortable, easy on/off and exactly as described and expected
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey L. Boelk

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: These sandals are a great fit on my size 11 feet. They are also light weight and easy to slip on. They have good cushioning on the soles and look good on my feet. I would buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: JT Evans

customer_reviews.title: comfort and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: use these for anything work in the yard, go out on the boat or an afternoon on the patio. a little more athletic than traditional sandals
customer_reviews.author: Big P

customer_reviews.title: Teva  Sandals
customer_reviews.text: Been wearing Teva Sandals 20yrs........The best ,/ Other Brands of Sandals Get Hard . Teva stay soft all threw the life of the Sandal,,,
customer_reviews.author: jerry

customer_reviews.title: Not too happy with it and I will have to find something ...
customer_reviews.text: I buy the same size for Teva and this new version Katavi 2 runs small - about a size too small. The have shortened the velcro also. Not too happy with it and I will have to find something else.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable sandals at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: These sandals fit perfectly to size. He wears them daily. They are made well and very comfortable. The price was right also - less expensive as other vendors.
customer_reviews.author: Daryl Fry

customer_reviews.title: Extra comfy long lasting sandals!
customer_reviews.text: I've worn Teva sandals for nearly 20 years, each pair listing 4 or 5 years. They fit the arch of my feet very well, are adjustable on width (important because I have EEEE wide feet), in short ver comfortable. I wear them all the time in dry, warm weather.
customer_reviews.author: CARL

customer_reviews.title: Broken straps
customer_reviews.text: My husband had ordered these and within 6 moths the straps broke and we were unable to return them due the time limit of return. He was very disappointed as he has multiple styles of this brand
customer_reviews.author: shelly

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my husband. He loves them! Took but a couple of hours to break them in.
customer_reviews.author: jojo74

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight but sturdy sandals!
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this brand previously and it is comfortable and sturdy. These sandals fit very well out of the box. Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: treesalesman

customer_reviews.title: The footbed was fantastic. They were too slim for my foot
customer_reviews.text: The footbed was fantastic. They were too slim for my foot. I had them stretched. I do have a slightly wide foot though. Now they are great!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I'm on my 3rd pair...love these sandals and I stand all day.
customer_reviews.author: David Okrant

customer_reviews.title: The fit of this sandal is great and the construction of the product is nice
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect sandal for my husband who prefers to wear sandals all year long, even in the winter time when it's not too wet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Teva's so far!
customer_reviews.text: I've had Teva's for years and this is my favorite pair so far! I love the style, they're very comfortable, and they fit as I expected. Great sandals.
customer_reviews.author: D. Thornton

customer_reviews.title: Reorder!
customer_reviews.text: This is a reorder, love this product. Old ones fell apart, but pretty old, sole separated
customer_reviews.author: Cmharvey27

customer_reviews.title: Fits well
customer_reviews.text: I just bought these shoes for my dad and so far they fit his feet as expected. Time will tell if this product holds up in terms of comfort and durability. I hope that it does because I have got the best dad in the world!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality,
customer_reviews.text: Velco straps across the top really need to be longer, had to add an extension on the strap. However, since my husband’s feet do swell, that’s most likely part of the problem. But straps should be longer. Like them otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis Papin

customer_reviews.title: All day comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I had a very old pair of Teva's that finally wore out... as comfortable under foot as the original's were, these are more so. The straps are softer around their edges and the foot bed is soft enough to wear all day. These are waterproof so washing the car, wearing them into rocky bottom water etc is easy. I enjoy them very much!
customer_reviews.author: robert ebstein

customer_reviews.title: Great sandles at fair price
customer_reviews.text: These sandles are very comfortable. I have worn them in the water and they dry quickly. Also wore while walking all day and didn't bother my feet. My only complaint is the heal strap isn't high enough for me it stays in place but would feel better if was little higher.
customer_reviews.author: Thor T.

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable sandals
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased 4-5 pairs of this model of Teva over the last 15-20 years. They're great and reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, well made sandals, and light weight!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these sandals for my dad (who is in his 70s) and he loved them. He said they are comfortable, light weight,and he can adjust them to wear with or without socks (yes he wears socks with his sandals).
customer_reviews.author: Alba Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I've tried them on and walked around in them for hours. They are comfortable and seem well built, and I believe that I would purchase them again when these wear out.
customer_reviews.author: Alan D

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking sandal.
customer_reviews.text: The sandals for very well, as sized. Comfortable and good support.
customer_reviews.author: wilda

customer_reviews.title: Nice sturdy sandal!
customer_reviews.text: I really recommend Teva brand sandals. They are very good quality & last a long time! My husband is blind, so he needs a good sandal as he really beats his shoes up. They are very comfortable and the Velcro straps stay tight/snug in place.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Plastic parts exposed
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice looking sandal but the front loop holding the strap is too wide. The felt beneath is too narrow causing plastic to push into your foot.
customer_reviews.author: Cubus

customer_reviews.title: 100% satisfied
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable and not even broken in yet. Product as described; honest seller; highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Customer X

customer_reviews.title: Always enjoy a new pair
customer_reviews.text: Been using TEVA for over a decade, from FL to CO, they are always great and always last. TY Teva for the great products you make
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 2nd Pair and love them
customer_reviews.text: I love Teva. One of my few go to brands. I highly recommend for anyone looking for sturdy sandals.
customer_reviews.author: Rex McArtor

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love these saddles, first pair I can wear every day
customer_reviews.author: David A. Watson

customer_reviews.title: Good Sandal
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to replace an old pair of Teva I had for a few years and they fit well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: comfortable, durable
customer_reviews.text: High quality, comfortable, durable. I have tried all brands, Teva sandals fit, feel, wear & look the best!!
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a gift for my boyfriend to wear for Bonnaroo. He's been wearing them off and on just to break them in but he said they really don't need to be broken in. He loves them. He said they are the most comfortable sandals he's ever worn!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Quality product that lasts a long time
customer_reviews.text: I am a woman’s size 9-9.5, so I ordered men’s size 8. Perfect. Love the thick soles. Use them all day for anything. Can even hike comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Truth Seeker

customer_reviews.title: Like This Model
customer_reviews.text: This Teva sandal is a good fit for my wide feet. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: SabreMia

customer_reviews.title: I would give them a five, but I get ...
customer_reviews.text: I would give them a five, but I get a slight foot order from this particular tea. I didn't have this problem with my other Teva sandle.
customer_reviews.author: surrendertojesuschrist

customer_reviews.title: Been wearing Tevas for YEARS... Still love 'em.
customer_reviews.text: These are really part of my summer 'uniform'. Wear Tevas every day! This pair is classy enough for an afternoon party, but the usual Teva sturdy for everyday use.
customer_reviews.author: ClarasDad

customer_reviews.title: Holds firm to my foot with no flip-flop.
customer_reviews.text: Holds firm to my foot with no flip-flop with decent support for a sandal.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Albright

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Spring, summer and fall, let's my feet breath with comfort and support.
customer_reviews.author: stephen magin

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great colors, sizes were right on , very well made, and very comfortable right our of the box. Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Ken C

customer_reviews.title: Material Holding Strap Clip Broke off, DONT PURCHASE THIS PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: The sandals are actually pretty confortable, the reason I gave them two starts was becuase the material makes ur feet sweet and smell. (I have owned other Teva shoes without having that issue). Furthermore, after months of use the material holding the clip for one of the straps broked off and now one pair of sandals is useless. I wouldnt recomend this type of sandals, I would recomend the traditional Tava sandals.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

product_meta.title: Teva Men's M Katavi 2 Sport Sandal
product_meta.description: Outfitted with rich, supple suede and cool-wearing mesh, this new, modern take on the classic Katavi channels heritage outdoor style to carry you comfortably into adventure.
feature_bullets: Nylon shank stabilizes and supports your foot on uneven terrain
Rugged Durabrasion Rubber outsole stands up to abuse and supplies great traction
-Contoured EVA footbed supports your arch to keep your foot happy
-Easy hook-and-loop closure comes on and off quickly and gets the fit just right
